title: Prompt Engineering Roadmap
description: A step-by-step learning path to master prompt engineering for AI, LLMs, and real-world applications.

modules.title: Introduction to Prompt Engineering
modules.description: Learn about prompt engineering, its importance, and foundational AI concepts.

steps.title: Understanding the basics of Prompt Engineering
Importance and applications in AI interactions
Overview of Large Language Models (LLMs)

modules.title: Foundations of Prompt Design
modules.description: Build a strong foundation in prompt design principles.

steps.title: Key components of effective prompts
General principles for crafting prompts
Best practices in prompt formulation

modules.title: Understanding AI and NLP
modules.description: Understand how LLMs and NLP power prompt engineering.

steps.title: Basics of Artificial Intelligence and Natural Language Processing
How LLMs interpret and generate responses
Role of tokenization in AI responses

modules.title: Crafting Effective Prompts
modules.description: Develop techniques for clear, specific, and context-rich prompts.

steps.title: Techniques for clear and concise prompt writing
Incorporating context and specificity
Avoiding ambiguity in prompts

modules.title: Advanced Prompting Techniques
modules.description: Master advanced techniques like chain-of-thought and few-shot prompting.

steps.title: Chain-of-Thought Prompting
Few-Shot and Zero-Shot Learning
Iterative refinement of prompts

modules.title: Real-World Applications
modules.description: Apply prompting skills to real-world tasks and products.

steps.title: Implementing prompts in chatbots and virtual assistants
Using prompts for content generation and summarization
Applications in data analysis and decision support

modules.title: Ethical Considerations
modules.description: Understand and address ethical issues in prompt engineering.

steps.title: Understanding biases in AI responses
Ensuring fairness and inclusivity in prompt design
Addressing ethical challenges in AI interactions

projects.title: Prompt-Based Text Summarizer
projects.description: Build a tool that summarizes articles or documents using prompt engineering on an LLM.

projects.title: Prompted Chatbot Assistant
projects.description: Create a chatbot that responds intelligently using crafted prompts.

projects.title: Chain-of-Thought Reasoning Tool
projects.description: Develop a tool that uses Chain-of-Thought Prompting for step-by-step problem solving.

projects.title: Prompt-Driven Data Analysis Assistant
projects.description: Build a data assistant that analyzes input data and provides insights via LLM prompts.

projects.title: Ethical Prompt Evaluator
projects.description: Create a tool that evaluates prompts for bias, inclusivity, and ethical considerations.
